Text: Well, you asked that we go easy, but: You posted an app that is not cracked. You weren't sure if it was working. You don't have a serial and you don't have any suggestions for where we might get one. And you're not seeding. So, going as easy as I can: you failed on four out of four critical aspects. Not a good beginning.
